member.name: T:Csla.Data.EF6.DbContextManager`1
member.summary: Provides an automated way to reuse Entity Framework DbContext objects within the context of a single data portal operation.
member.typeparam: Type of database DbContext object to use.
member.remarks: This type stores the object context object in and uses reference counting through to keep the data context object open for reuse by child objects, and to automatically dispose the object when the last consumer has called Dispose."

member.name: M:Csla.Data.EF6.DbContextManager`1.GetManager
member.summary: Gets the ObjectContextManager object for the /// specified database.

member.name: M:Csla.Data.EF6.DbContextManager`1.GetManager(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the ObjectContextManager object for the specified database.
member.param: Database name as shown in the config file.

member.name: M:Csla.Data.EF6.DbContextManager`1.GetManager(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the ObjectContextManager object for the specified database.
member.param: Database name as shown in the config file.

member.name: M:Csla.Data.EF6.DbContextManager`1.GetManager(System.String,System.Data.Entity.Infrastructure.DbCompiledModel)
member.summary: Gets the ObjectContextManager object for the specified database.
member.param: Database name as shown in the config file.

member.name: M:Csla.Data.EF6.DbContextManager`1.GetManager(System.String,System.String,System.Data.Entity.Infrastructure.DbCompiledModel)
member.summary: Gets the ObjectContextManager object for the specified database.
member.param: The database name or connection string.

member.summary: Gets the ObjectContextManager object for the specified database.
member.param: The ObjectContext to wrap in DbContext

member.summary: Dispose object, dereferencing or disposing the context it is managing.

member.summary: Gets the current reference count for this object.

member.name: T:Csla.Data.EF6.ObjectContextManager`1
member.summary: Provides an automated way to reuse Entity Framework object context objects within the context of a single data portal operation.
member.typeparam: Type of database object context object to use.
member.remarks: This type stores the object context object in and uses reference counting through to keep the data context object open for reuse by child objects, and to automatically dispose the object when the last consumer has called Dispose."

member.name: M:Csla.Data.EF6.ObjectContextManager`1.GetManager(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the ObjectContextManager object for the specified database.
member.param: Database name as shown in the config file.

member.summary: Gets the ObjectContextManager object for the specified database.
member.param: Database name as shown in the config file.

member.name: M:Csla.Data.EF6.ObjectContextManager`1.GetManager(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets the ObjectContextManager object for the specified database.
member.param: The database name or connection string.
True to indicate that the connection string should be retrieved from the config file. If False, the database parameter is directly used as a connection string.

member.name: M:Csla.Data.EF6.ObjectContextManager`1.GetManager(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the ObjectContextManager object for the specified database.
member.param: The database name or connection string.
True to indicate that the connection string should be retrieved from the config file. If False, the database parameter is directly used as a connection string.

member.summary: Dispose object, dereferencing or disposing the context it is managing.
